author: lowette
body:
@delaere @ebrondol @boudoul
Commit for geometric CPE as presented in simulation meeting on 9/5. Validation config was cleaned up so that it can run.
For this also a dictionary was added for an edm::Ref to a Phase2TrackerCluster1D, such that Phase2TrackerRecHit1D can be persisted.
(note: this comment was edited after the thread below and subsequent developments)
title: Geometric CPE and persistent rechits for Phase 2 tracker local reco
